name: Siren Head Free Android Game
description:
The Siren Head surrounding your area was kept in yourstown! He has killed someone, and your mission is to escape from the Haunted house as soon as you can in this horror adventure game.

The Siren Head surrounding your area  and your mission is to escape from the forest  as soon as you can in this horror adventure game.

The noisy sound of siren head is more scary than how they look like, do not make yourself victim of this monstrous creature, you know how to calm your heart in the dark and how to handle these horror nightmare.
